Literature.Title: Designed Antimicrobial Peptides Against Trauma-Related Cutaneous Invasive Fungal Wound Infections.
Literature.Author: Woodburn KW, Jaynes JM, Clemens LE

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans NRRL Y-326(MIC=64µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis NRRL Y-1761(MIC=>128µg/ml),Candida krusei NRRL Y-27803(MIC=64µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus(MIC=>=128µg/ml),Aspergillus flavus ATCC MYA-3651(MIC=>=128µg/ml),Lichtheimia corymbifera NRRL 6251(MIC=32µg/ml),Fusarium solani NRRL 28548(MIC=16µg/ml),Mucor circinelloides NRRL 3631(MIC=32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=>128µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=>128µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 19660(MIC=>128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 51625(MIC=>128µg/ml)
